reviews.review: Благодаря этой игре, узнал свою истинную сущность

Same old game. New graphics and new hacks. Fun to test your reflexes, but that's about all it is good for. The physics and accuracy still have anything to be desired; People can shoot at or even through walls and get head shots. The maps never change so people are frequently camping every little blind spot or odd angle you could think of, so again it's just down to reflexes. I won't recommend this, because the casual player is at an extreme disadvantage. None-the less, if you are like me and prefer a challenge and can hold you're own; you might be average or better and find the experience occasionally gratifying experience of beating pros on their own turf.

It's not really a game of skill so much anymore as of just another aspect of warfare; memorizing your environment and this game allows a lot of people to do just that. Along with memorizing, your reflexes and ESPECIALLY LISTENING FOR YOUR ENEMY; you should do well. Happy hunting.
